job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pInflection is seeking a Software Engineer who will be responsible for supporting software development activities for Inflections productsppbrppFor over ten years Inflection has sourced and analyzed billions of public records to create fair and innovative solutions to help companies make better and faster decisions about who they should hire and who they should trustppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliSupport complete software development life cycle for Inflections products including requirements analysis design development testing and deploymentliliImplement own and support microservices thirdparty integrations and security features Work will include migrating components to microservices using serverless technologyliliThis role requires working with customers product managers and customer support technologiesliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBachelors Degree in software engineering Computer Science or related fieldlili2 years of experience in software developmentliliExperience with the design implementation and debugging of applications in object oriented languages Strong preference for NETCliul
